text: The 1908 Central Michigan Normalites football team represented Central Michigan Normal School, later renamed Central Michigan University, as an independent during the 1908 college football season. In their first and only season under head coach Hugh Sutherland, the Central Michigan football team compiled a 4–3 record. ==Schedule== ==References== Central Michigan Category:Central Michigan Chippewas football seasons Central Michigan Normalites football
title: 1908 Central Michigan Normalites football team
